nodes.text: The Museum of Multispecies Sciences was located on the planet Coruscant during the reign of Emperor Sheev Palpatine. Imperial Cadet Jude Edivon suggested a trip there while on leave from the Royal Imperial Academy, but her fellow classmates were against the idea, with Kendy Idele telling her it was a tedious place and Ciena Ree inwardly thinking visiting the museum would be completely boring.
The Museum of Multispecies Sciences was first mentioned in the 2015 canon novel Lost Stars.
